00020 #pragma once

00030 class Mount_tree;
00031 
00039 class Be_file : public File
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   // used in close, to unlock all locks of a file (as POSIX says)
00043   int unlock_all_locks() throw()
00044   { return 0; }
00045 
00046   // for mmap
00047   L4::Cap<L4Re::Dataspace> data_space() const throw()
00048   { return L4::Cap<L4Re::Dataspace>::Invalid; }
00049 
00051   ssize_t readv(const struct iovec*, int) throw()
00052   { return -EINVAL; }
00053 
00055   ssize_t writev(const struct iovec*, int) throw()
00056   { return -EINVAL; }
00057 
00059   ssize_t pwritev(const struct iovec*, int, off64_t) throw()
00060   { return -EINVAL; }
00061 
00063   ssize_t preadv(const struct iovec*, int, off64_t) throw()
00064   { return -EINVAL; }
00065 
00067   off64_t lseek64(off64_t, int) throw()
00068   { return -ESPIPE; }
00069 
00071   int ftruncate64(off64_t) throw()
00072   { return -EINVAL; }
00073 
00075   int fsync() const throw()
00076   { return -EINVAL; }
00077 
00079   int fdatasync() const throw()
00080   { return -EINVAL; }
00081 
00083   int ioctl(unsigned long, va_list) throw()
00084   { return -EINVAL; }
00085 
00086   int fstat64(struct stat64 *) const throw()
00087   { return -EINVAL; }
00088 
00090   int fchmod(mode_t) throw()
00091   { return -EINVAL; }
00092 
00094   int get_status_flags() const throw()
00095   { return 0; }
00096 
00098   int set_status_flags(long) throw()
00099   { return 0; }
00100 
00102   int get_lock(struct flock64 *) throw()
00103   { return -ENOLCK; }
00104 
00106   int set_lock(struct flock64 *, bool) throw()
00107   { return -ENOLCK; }
00108 
00110   int faccessat(const char *, int, int) throw()
00111   { return -ENOTDIR; }
00112 
00114   int utime(const struct utimbuf *) throw()
00115   { return -EROFS; }
00116 
00118   int utimes(const struct utimbuf [2]) throw()
00119   { return -EROFS; }
00120 
00122   int mkdir(const char *, mode_t) throw()
00123   { return -ENOTDIR; }
00124 
00126   int unlink(const char *) throw()
00127   { return -ENOTDIR; }
00128 
00130   int rename(const char *, const char *) throw()
00131   { return -ENOTDIR; }
00132 
00134   int link(const char *, const char *) throw()
00135   { return -ENOTDIR; }
00136 
00138   int symlink(const char *, const char *) throw()
00139   { return -EPERM; }
00140 
00142   int rmdir(const char *) throw()
00143   { return -ENOTDIR; }
00144 
00146   ssize_t readlink(char *, size_t)
00147   { return -EINVAL; }
00148 
00149   ssize_t getdents(char *, size_t) throw()
00150   { return -ENOTDIR; }
00151 
00152   ~Be_file() throw() = 0;
00153 
00154 private:
00156   int get_entry(const char *, int, mode_t, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> *) throw()
00157   { return -ENOTDIR; }
00158 
00159 protected:
00160   const char *get_mount(const char *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> *dir) throw();
00161 };
00162 
00163 inline
00164 Be_file::~Be_file() throw() {}
00165 
00166 class Be_file_pos : public Be_file
00167 {
00168 public:
00169   Be_file_pos() throw() : Be_file(), _pos(0) {}
00170 
00171   virtual off64_t size() const throw() = 0;
00172 
00173   ssize_t readv(const struct iovec *v, int iovcnt) throw()
00174   {
00175     ssize_t r = preadv(v, iovcnt, _pos);
00176     if (r > 0)
00177       _pos += r;
00178     return r;
00179   }
00180 
00181   ssize_t writev(const struct iovec *v, int iovcnt) throw()
00182   {
00183     ssize_t r = pwritev(v, iovcnt, _pos);
00184     if (r > 0)
00185       _pos += r;
00186     return r;
00187   }
00188 
00189   ssize_t preadv(const struct iovec *v, int iovcnt, off64_t offset) throw() = 0;
00190   ssize_t pwritev(const struct iovec *v, int iovcnt, off64_t offset) throw() = 0;
00191 
00192   off64_t lseek64(off64_t offset, int whence) throw()
00193   {
00194     off64_t r;
00195     switch (whence)
00196       {
00197       case SEEK_SET: r = offset; break;
00198       case SEEK_CUR: r = _pos + offset; break;
00199       case SEEK_END: r = size() + offset; break;
00200       default: return -EINVAL;
00201       };
00202 
00203     if (r < 0)
00204       return -EINVAL;
00205 
00206     _pos = r;
00207     return _pos;
00208   }
00209 
00210 protected:
00211   off64_t pos() const throw() { return _pos; }
00212 
00213 private:
00214   off64_t _pos;
00215 };
00216 
00217 class Be_file_stream : public Be_file
00218 {
00219 public:
00220   ssize_t preadv(const struct iovec *v, int iovcnt, off64_t) throw()
00221   { return readv(v, iovcnt); }
00222 
00223   ssize_t pwritev(const struct iovec *v, int iovcnt, off64_t) throw()
00224   { return writev(v, iovcnt); }
00225 
00226 };
00227 
00234 class Be_file_system : public File_system
00235 {
00236 private:
00237   char const *const _fstype;
00238 
00239 public:
00240 
00248   explicit Be_file_system(char const *fstype) throw()
00249   : File_system(), _fstype(fstype)
00250   {
00251     vfs_ops->register_file_system(this);
00252   }
00253 
00260   ~Be_file_system() throw()
00261   {
00262     vfs_ops->unregister_file_system(this);
00263   }
00264 
00270   char const *type() const throw() { return _fstype; }
00271 };
00272 
00273 /* Make sure filesystems can register before the constructor of libmount
00274  * runs */
00275 #define L4RE_VFS_FILE_SYSTEM_ATTRIBUTE \
00276      __attribute__((init_priority(INIT_PRIO_LATE_VAL)))
00277 
00278 }}
